newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: BOK offers to sell dlrs in forward trade - dealers.
newsitem.headline: BOK offers to sell dlrs in forward trade - dealers.

text.p: The central Bank of Korea (BOK) was seen offering to sell dollars in forward trading during Monday morning session to slow the U.S. unit's climb against the domestic currency, dealers said.
The central bank offered to sell $30 million each at 893.00 won in three-month forward trading and at 907.00 won in six-month forward trading, they said.
